document.docAuthor: J. M, Gusenleitner, J. & Madl, M.
document.masterDocTitle: A Catalogue of the Eumeninae (Hymenoptera: Vespidae) of the Ethiopian Region excluding Malagasy Subregion. Part II: Genera Delta de SAUSSURE 1885 to Zethus FABRICIUS 1804 and Species Incertae Sedis

D i s t r i b u t i o n: Cameroon , Democratic Republic of Congo , Eritrea , Ethiopia , Gambia , Ghana , Ivory Coast , Kenya , Mali , Mauritania , Niger , Nigeria , Senegal , Sierra Leone , Somalia , Sudan , Togo .
Known from the Palearctic Region. In the Malagasy Subregion recorded from Seychelles (Aldabra).
